profile.name: Sameer Gupta
profile.bio: Nothing is as permanent as a temporary solution that works

ai_analysis.purpose: Repository for C code implementations of various fundamental data structures and algorithms, likely created as part of a college-level Data Structures & Algorithms course
key_features: Implementation of common data structures like linked lists (singly, doubly, circular), queues (including priority queues), and graphs
Implementation of graph traversal algorithms (BFS and DFS)
Implementation of a binary search algorithm
Example code for polynomial addition using linked lists
use_cases: Students: Can use the code as a learning resource for understanding and implementing data structures and algorithms in C
Developers: May refer to specific implementations for reference or adapt them for use in their own projects

ai_analysis.purpose: Contains implementations of various algorithms and data structures, likely for educational or demonstration purposes. Collection of solutions to classic algorithmic problems often encountered in a Design and Analysis of Algorithms (DAA) course
key_features: Coin Change Problem (DP and Greedy approaches)
use_cases: Students: Learning and practicing algorithm implementations in C
Developers: Quick reference or starting point for implementing specific algorithms
Interview Preparation: Practicing common algorithm questions for technical interviews

ai_analysis.purpose: Implements various classic Artificial Intelligence (AI) search algorithms and optimization techniques. Provides hands-on code examples and implementations for exploring and understanding fundamental AI concepts
key_features: Jupyter Notebooks for interactive exploration and demonstration
use_cases: Self-learners gaining practical understanding of AI concepts

repositories.name: CodePencil
repositories.description: CodePencil is a collaborative coding platform supporting HTML, CSS, JS, and C++. It allows multiple users to work together on a single codebase in real-time with the "Friends Activity" feature, enhancing the collaborative experience. CodePencil also offers storage, enabling users to save and manage their files for future use efficiently.

ai_analysis.purpose: Collaborative online coding environment designed for real-time co-editing of HTML, CSS, JS, and C++ code. Enables multiple users to work together on a single project
key_features: Language Support: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and C++
use_cases: Students: Ideal for collaborative coding assignments and learning
Small Teams: Useful for quick prototyping and collaborative debugging
Educational Institutions: Platform for teaching and collaborative coding workshops
Open-Source Contributors: Simplifies collaborative coding during hackathons

repositories.name: Learning-Management-System
repositories.description: Our LMS caters to disabled students with tailored accessibility features, alternative assessments, collaborative tools, and personalized learning paths, fostering an inclusive educational environment.

ai_analysis.purpose: Front-end web application, likely a single-page application (SPA) built with React, potentially related to note-taking functionality
use_cases: Individuals who need a simple web application for creating and managing notes
Users requiring a secure platform to store notes behind a login system
Learning/example project for React and related technologies

repositories.name: HachNCode_Gaavwale
repositories.description: Artify is a game-based creative learning platform aimed at students passionate about creative thinking. It nurtures talents in music, painting, drawing, and more through interactive activities. With leaderboards to inspire growth and an art gallery to showcase students' work, Artify makes learning creativity fun and engaging.

ai_analysis.purpose: Create a chatbot interface that integrates with a local instance of Ollama, a framework for running large language models (LLMs) locally
key_features: Text input and output for conversational interaction
Frontend interface for displaying chatbot functionality
use_cases: Users who prioritize privacy and security
